name: .GHX File Extension
summary: Learn about .GHX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a GHX file in Grasshopper, which is included with McNeel Rhino (Windows, Mac). To open Grasshopper, enter grasshopper in Rhino's Command: field. After Grasshopper opens, select File â†’ Open and open your GHX file. Then, you can edit the program your file contains and link it to the geometry in a 3DM file.

If necessary, you can also open a GHX file in any text or source code editor, to view the XML data it contains. Source code editors, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Code (cross-platform), will highlight the file's XML syntax.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
